name: WildRoots Festival 2025
description: Your digital companion for the Sustainable Living & Wellness Festival experience

events.title: Morning Yoga & Meditation
events.description: Start your festival day with mindful movement and meditation in nature. Open to all levels.
events.speaker: Maya Thompson

events.title: Building Your Sustainable Home
events.description: Learn practical tips for creating an eco-friendly living space that reduces your environmental footprint.
events.speaker: Dr. Green Thompson

events.title: Plant-Based Cooking Workshop
events.description: Discover delicious plant-based recipes using local, seasonal ingredients. Tasting included!
events.speaker: Chef Maria Santos

events.title: Permaculture Design Principles
events.description: Explore how to design sustainable systems that work with nature, not against it.
events.speaker: Alex Rivera

events.title: Sound Healing & Crystal Bowls
events.description: Experience the therapeutic power of sound vibrations for deep relaxation and healing.
events.speaker: Luna Chen

map.title: Festival Map

vendors.title: Vendor Village
vendors.description: Discover sustainable brands and local artisans

featured.name: Green Kitchen Co.

featured.name: Earth Essentials

about.title: About WildRoots Festival
about.mission: Connecting people with nature, sustainable living, and mindful wellness practices
about.description: WildRoots Festival is a celebration of sustainable living, environmental consciousness, and holistic wellness. We bring together like-minded individuals, experts, and vendors to create a transformative experience that inspires positive change.

values.title: Environmental Stewardship
values.description: We're committed to minimizing our environmental impact and promoting sustainable practices.

values.title: Community Connection
values.description: Building meaningful connections between people, nature, and sustainable living practices.

values.title: Holistic Wellness
values.description: Supporting physical, mental, and spiritual well-being through natural and mindful approaches.

values.title: Education & Awareness
values.description: Empowering individuals with knowledge and tools for sustainable living.

contact.address: Sunset Meadows, 123 Nature Trail, Green Valley, CA 90210

faq.question: What should I bring to the festival?
faq.answer: Bring a reusable water bottle, comfortable walking shoes, weather-appropriate clothing, and an open mind! We provide all necessary materials for workshops.

faq.question: Is the festival family-friendly?
faq.answer: Yes! We have activities and workshops suitable for all ages, including a dedicated children's area with nature-based activities.

faq.question: Are pets allowed?
faq.answer: Service animals are welcome. For other pets, please check our pet policy as some areas may have restrictions.

faq.question: What's the parking situation?
faq.answer: We have designated parking areas with electric vehicle charging stations. We encourage carpooling and offer bike storage facilities.
